description: Fix formatting typo in conversation article

messages.text:

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.blog/

content/a-conversation-with-the-go-team.article:96: drivers. Now that drivers exist, usage of the package is increasing and and
Please also remove the duplicated word "and".

LGTM after edit
